text: what excites me is the fact that there's
always something new here in aws
so what i mean is that there's always a
new technology
a new solution that we need to create
it's been a fun ride here in aws
[Music]
my name is kyle chua i'm from the
philippines and i'm a technical trainer
here in aws
my name is niro najiha i'm from malaysia
and i'm from the aws tech q program
fresh out of college i was looking for a
graduate program to join
since i already had a previous
experience with aws
i thought why not join this program my
interview experience was slightly
overwhelming but once i step into the
room and meet all the people
they are very intelligent and that makes
me feel like i really want to work in
this company
this is a good place to start my career
with the training and certification
team has been really good to me
throughout the tecu program
we've been having a lot of conversations
where we just share our knowledge share
our passion for teaching
they've been really helpful to me in
terms of teaching me how to deliver
content to customers and to be effective
on it there's lots of opportunity for
growth and we are encouraged to learn
and be curious and we are encouraged to
build upon our skills by taking
certifications
we have academic sprints followed by
on-the-job training
and we are able to get a mentor that are
willing to help you
build a career and help you grow as a
person it's a good training ground
before we
go out in the real world we are given
lectures and we're able to learn and be
curious about the aws technology
what excites me to come to work every
day is the tremendous learning
opportunity and i have the chance to use
all the aws services and build a project
on my own
i think going out of college i always
had this notion that
i already know a lot of things but after
going through the interview process the
tech u program
i think there's a lot of things that i
need to explore on and learn more about
and meeting
different people with diverse career
backgrounds made me realize that
there are so much more things to learn
about and i'm so excited to start this
journey with aws
my advice would be don't be afraid if
you feel like you don't have the
technical credibility or enough
experience to join aws because you will
get all the trainings here and this
company will help you grow as a person
every day is day one in aws
